product_name: FalconGuides Best Easy Day Hikes Shenandoah National Park - 4th Edition
long_description: The updated Best Easy Day Hikes: Shenandoah National Park features descriptions and easy-to-follow maps for 27 short hikes along the Skyline Drive in the Blue Ridge Mountains of Virginia.
short_description: The updated Best Easy Day Hikes: Shenandoah National Park features descriptions and easy-to-follow maps for 27 short hikes along the Skyline Drive in the Blue Ridge Mountains of Virginia.
